title: Riot, change my rank please
body: IM SO CONFUSED. I ended in Bronze 2 last season and just did my placements, I went 6/4 and got b5? Is this getting harder and harder every season?

replies.body: We all get placed lower then where we were. Just climb again

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Xgqv9Vpq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-23T10:21:48.225+0000)
>
> We all get placed lower then where we were. Just climb again

I know a guy that won 4/5 and got promoted to plat 3 from plat 4
IT IS A RESET. THIS HAPPENS EVERY YEAR.
Your placement isnt based on wins but they play a part in it. It goes over things like KDA etc

> [{quoted}](name=Exalted Lucina,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Xgqv9Vpq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-23T11:08:04.957+0000)
>
> Your placement isnt based on wins but they play a part in it. It goes over things like KDA etc

I went positive in nearly every game and had heaps of assists in about half of the games
